phrases: July 15th (Thurs) 8:30 PM
This is not good...
This is not good at all!
I need to let Yoshikage know!
Reimi!
You took this picture, Rohan?
Yes, why?
This one is marked.
Is there something wrong with it?
The one you have circled looks a little boy.
Hayato Kawajiri
Oh, him...
It is nothing, really.
He seemed to be snooping around, so he caught my attention.
But this boy, Hayato Kawajiri, has the same last name as this man here.
Huh?
Really?
Look!
Kosaku Kawajiri
It is the same.
You are the one who researched this, are not you?
They do have the same last name.
At this rate, Rohan Kishibe will find his way to Yoshikage!
July 15th (Thurs) 8:48 PM
Hayato?
Hayato!
Ugh...
Hayato, I have been calling you!
You can at least answer me!
D-Darling...
I thought it was Hayato in the bath.
I mean, look at this!
Hayato left his clothes in the hallway as if they exploded off of him.
Unlike you, no matter how many times I warn him, he is such a slob.
And he is not answering me again.
I am sure he is probably got his headphones on, reading manga again.
Oh!
Darling, your fingers are bleeding.
What happened?
We need to put a bandage on it.
I-I will do it myself.
I can apply a bandage myself.
Okay...
I just got my fingers caught in the door, that is all.
Jojo's Bizarre Adventure
Diamond is Unbreakable
July 15th (Thurs) 8:50 PM
Hayato Kawajiri?
Are you saying this grade-schooler has something to do with Yoshikage Kira?
Episode 35 Bites the Dust, Part 1
We are not 100 sure yet,
but Rohan-sensei said something bugs him about it.
True, there is something wrong if he is secretly taking videos of his dad.
So, tomorrow morning, we are thinking of meeting up
and going to visit Hayato Kawajiri's house.
Apparently, Rohan-sensei's already found the address.
That bastard Rohan sure works fast.
All right.
I just have to invite Okuyasu, right?
And of course, there is Jotaro, too.
I will talk to Jotaro.
All right.
See you tomorrow at 8:30 AM
at the intersection with the Pepsi sign.
Got it.
I am going to be late for school.
But if we talk to this kid, we might find something out.
Are you okay?
You are acting a bit strange, darling...
And you look pale.
I told you, it is nothing.
I caught my fingers in the door.
Can you blame me for being pale?
More importantly, can you make me some tea?
I will be down soon.
Of course.
This just came to me out of the blue,
but lately, I cannot help but think that you are immortal.
I will go make you that tea now.
If something happens to me, your secret's going to be found out!
Do not you lay a finger on me or my mom!
This is not a deal!
You have to listen to me!
Got it?!
You are too naIve!
Do you really think I would allow that?
I cannot believe you actually got rid of Hayato.
What a stupid thing to do.
I am trying to think of what to do right now.
It is no use thinking about it.
I see you made it look like he fell and hit his head,
but the timing was unfortunate.
That Rohan Kishibe has started investigating Hayato Kawajiri.
They are still not positive that Kosaku Kawajiri is you,
but they are coming to check this house tomorrow.
It is a bad idea to stay in this house any longer.
Shut up.
I am thinking right now.
Ever since you were a child, when things did not go your way
and there was nothing you could do, you would always bite your nails.
You poor thing.
You must be in so much despair right now.
There is no other way around it.
You are going to have to leave this town, Yoshikage.
If you go now, you can escape to someplace they cannot follow you, before they find out.
Are you telling me to flee Morioh?
You know very well that I am done with living my life in fear,
having to worry about someone coming after me!
I will never leave this town.
What?!
The arrow acted on its own!
I did not do anything!
I did not even touch the arrow!
Th-The arrow...
Y-Yoshikage!
Hayato!
Hayato?!
July 16th (Fri) 7:30 AM
Are you planning to sleep all day, Hayato?
Hurry up and wake
What, you are already awake?
That is a surprise.
Hayato, breakfast is ready.
Honestly, why do not you ever answer me?
I could not sleep very well last night.
He...
He found out that I saw him kill someone.
Anyway, I made sure that he would not be able to lay a finger
on me or Mom, but...
What should I do now?
I-I do not understand...
What happened, Yoshikage?
You have been acting strange since last night.
Listen to me, Yoshikage!
That Rohan Kishibe has started investigating Hayato Kawajiri for some reason!
They are going to come check this house tomorrow.
There is no need to worry.
B-But, Yoshikage!
Deadly Queen has gained a third ability.
What could have happened to make you so carefree?
-Morioh's Very Own-
Miso-stewed Cow Tongue
Miso-stewed cow tongue.
What?
No way!
We are on the air already?
Er, um...
It is now 7:55, so here is the weather today for the prefecture.
Today should be sunny.
Hayato!
Hey, Hayato!
Answer the phone.
After that bath last night, he changed.
Wh-What could have happened?
Hayato!
I asked you to answer the phone!
My precious tea set!
This is all your fault!
Why do you always ignore me?!
Fine!
You think your mother's just a bother, right?!
Do whatever you want, then!
Now, now.
Let us not fight first thing in the morning.
If it broke, I will just buy you another one.
Hello, Kawajiri residence.
No, it is not.
They had the wrong number.
Hayato's just at an age where he does not want to talk much.
We are family, so we all need to get along.
You know, get along.
Well, I will head off to work now.
Do you mind if I give you a goodbye kiss?
Huh?
I will be off now.
H-He left...
No, I am right here.
Why do not we walk together part of the way?
Going from feeling refreshed to falling into despair...
So much has happened lately.
I have been on an emotional roller coaster.
But now I will be able to feel at ease.
Since you cornered me last night, I was able to mature.
Really, your will last night was so strong.
To think that you would actually turn around and threaten me, Yoshikage Kira...
Y-Yoshikage Kira?
Did I just say my real name?
A-Are you planning to kill me after all?
Kill you?
Because you found out my secret?
There is no need for that.
Because I have matured.
No matter where you go and what you do with anyone,
it does not matter, because now, none can rival me.
I have no interest in you anymore.
If I wanted to kill you...
I would have gotten rid of you last night.
From now on, we are all going to get along and live happily together.
So just relax...
Like we are family.
Well, I have to head to the station.
Make sure you study hard, Hayato.
Rival...
He just said none can rival him...
Which means there must be others
that have the same kind of abilities as him.
But what is with that creepy confidence?
If he is unrivaled now, does that mean he is gained some other abilities?
What should I do?
What am I supposed to do?
You are...
Hayato Kawajiri-kun,
are not you?
De
Dead
Deadly
Deadly Qu
Deadly Que
Deadly Quee
Deadly Queen
Ko
Kosaku
Kosaku Kawa
Kosaku Kawajiri
July 16th (Fri) 8:24 AM
I have been waiting for you.
My name is Rohan Kishibe.
There is something that I wanted to ask you out of curiosity.
It is about this picture.
This is you, right?
Were you taking video of your dad in the corner there?
Wait.
What... is this?
Well, I know that was sudden...
But it is much faster to just read
about Hayato Kawajiri than to ask bothersome questions,
and I can get honest answers this way, too.
You must not read any further.
Huh?
What is that supposed to mean?
What Heaven's Door turns into a book
should just be the memories of this boy's life experiences, without any falsehoods.
And yet... a warning?
You must not read any further.
What in the world is this?
Is this warning what he experienced?
I thought I would just casually look into this child,
but now this has definitely caught my interest.
You must not read any further.
You must not read any further?
Who in the world could this warning be for?
An old guy walked by with his fly down.
He sneezed and said, Damn it.
Some women laughed at him.
Wh-What is this?
This is getting even more confusing.
What does it mean?
Damn it.
J-Just who is this boy?
It rained.
Ugh, the forecast did not say it was going to rain!
At 8:27 AM, lightning struck above the Pepsi sign.
Wh-Who in the world is this Hayato Kawajiri?
Why is he experiencing things in the future?
Could he be a Stand user?
No...
This is too odd to be a Stand ability.
All I can read with Heaven's Door
is what he has personally seen or heard.
The answer to this should be written somewhere...
My dad is not my dad
He made a man and a woman disappear at an apartment in Jozenji by making them explode.
He is a murderer.
I found out who he was.
He has inhuman abilities.
My dad's name is Yoshikage Kira
Yoshikage Kira
Kira...
I-I did it!
This kid was the jackpot!
I finally found him!
Yoshikage Kira is Kosaku Kawajiri!
He is disguised himself as this kid's father!
Ro
ha
Kishi
be
was
also
ki
ll
ed
Rohan Kishibe was also killed?
He was killed by Kira,
He was killed by Kira, who had matured.
who had matured...
Deadly Queen's third bomb, Bites the Dust.
Heaven's Door!
Rohan Kishibe, Deadly Queen is already inside your eye!
That is what you are seeing!
The switch for Deadly Queen's third bomb
has already been activated!
Deadly Queen's third ability...
It is a bomb to blow away anyone who tries to come after me!
It will activate in anyone who tries to get close to Hayato in order to learn about me.
He was killed by Kira, who had matured.
Rohan Kishibe was also killed.
It will also activate if Hayato happens to verbally reveal my identity,
and if he writes it down, it will activate immediately.
Which means it is a bomb I implanted in Hayato!
C-Come to think of it,
I was supposed to meet Koichi and the others here at 8:30...
I finally... found out Yoshikage Kira's identity...
Koichi is coming.
I have to tell him...
Yoshikage Kira is Kosaku Kawajiri.
I found him with my Heaven's Door.
I have to tell...
Koichi...
And now,
this is the real third ability of Deadly Queen!
K-Koichi!
I-It was a dream?
I could not sleep very well last night.
I kept having these weird dreams...
Hayato!
Are you planning to sleep all day, Hayato?
Hurry up and wake
What, you are already awake?
That is a surprise.
Hayato, breakfast is ready.
Honestly, why do not you ever answer me?
D-Did not this...
What?
No way!
We are on the air already?
Th-This morning TV program...
Hayato!
Hey, Hayato!
Answer the phone.
Th-This is not a dream...
What I just saw was not a dream.
Th-This is the same morning.
It is repeating...
Today's morning is repeating again!
Yoshikage Kira...
His name is Yoshikage Kira!
He is doing this!
This is the unrivaled ability he was talking about,
and he planted that inside me!
Hayato!
I asked you to answer the phone!
Oh, yeah!
Look out
Ow...
That was a nice catch.
It was almost as if you knew it was going to fall.
But if you can hear me, you could at least answer!
Hello, Kawajiri residence.
Huh?
No, it is not.
It appears I am the only one in the world who is aware
that this morning is repeating.
It is almost as if you knew, huh?
Apparently you blew someone up and came back, Hayato.
No, really.
I do not know exactly what you have done.
This is called Deadly Queen Bites the Dust,
and it automatically protects me...
from inside you, Hayato.
Did you know that I already killed you once last night?
As though as it was trying to remedy
the despair I was feeling from the situation I was in,
I gained a brand new ability.
By using that ability on you, time went back an hour,
and the fact that I killed you disappeared.
At the same time, you became a bomb to protect me.
You told someone about me and the bomb activated, and then you came back.
Who did you blow away, hm?
Come on, tell me.
Who did you kill?
I-I did not tell anyone...
I see!
Then someone must have been asking you questions.
It must be that Rohan Kishibe.
Even if you have no intention of telling anyone,
as soon as someone asks you about me, Bites the Dust will activate.
And then you will blow him up and come back.
The very fact that Rohan Kishibe encountered you has disappeared!
That is Deadly Queen Bites the Dust.
You will not be able to tell anyone.
There will be no one who can ask you anything!
